sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_cdltd_chargesos.ChargingSosUpdates</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>true</client_callable><description>This contains various functions to dynamically update values via parameters</description><mobile_callable>false</mobile_callable><name>ChargingSosUpdates</name><sandbox_callable>false</sandbox_callable><script><![CDATA[var ChargingSosUpdates = Class.create();
ChargingSosUpdates.prototype = Object.extendsObject(global.AbstractAjaxProcessor, {
	updateUserAvailabilityStatusToBusy: function () {
		var userGr = new GlideRecord("sys_user");
		userGr.addQuery("sys_id", gs.getUserID());
		userGr.query();

		while (userGr.next()) {
			userGr.u_availability_status = "Busy";
			gs.info("SCRIPT INCLUDE: IT RAN I THINK");
			return userGr.update();
		}
	},
    type: 'ChargingSosUpdates'
});]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>emmynem</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-12-10 20:05:45</sys_created_on><sys_id>069c3ae083bd32107f44d4abc1da1e6b</sys_id><sys_mod_count>6</sys_mod_count><sys_name>ChargingSosUpdates</sys_name><sys_package display_value="ChargeSOS" source="x_cdltd_chargesos">d0d97bb983e132107f44d4abc1da1e09</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="ChargeSOS">d0d97bb983e132107f44d4abc1da1e09</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_069c3ae083bd32107f44d4abc1da1e6b</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>emmynem</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-12-10 21:11:24</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
